content:
Drone operators of the Presidential Brigade thwarted the occupiers' plans to install minefields.

About thisreported March 28The General Staff of the Armed Forces.

Aerial reconnaissance spotted a warehouse of enemy mines, and operators from the 4th Mechanized Battalion of the Presidential Brigade struck with an FPV drone.

The explosion of enemy ammunition was shot on video.

Asreported by ArmyInform, on the Left Bank of the Dnieper, our soldiers destroyed the BUK, 8 guns and almost 200 invaders.
title: Defense forces destroyed the enemy composition of ammunition
description: This was announced on March 28 by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.    Aerial reconnaissance spotted a warehouse of enemy mines, and...
author: Army Inform
